name: Shurelya's Battlesong
tooltip:
Shurelya's Battlesong

Cost: 2700


UNIQUE Passive - Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 2.5% bonus movement speed.

UNIQUE Active - Inspire: Grants you and nearby allies 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 4 seconds and 40 − 60 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on the next 3 attacks or ability hits against champions (90 second cooldown).
